mainText:
I am deeply saddened by the passing of Steve Jobs. I have loved Apple's 
products since my first introduction to the Macintosh Plus at the School 
of Design at North Carolina State University in 1982. In Steve Job's 
leadership at Apple, Next and Pixar, his dedication and insistence to 
always do things the best way possible, and to produce the absolutely 
best products possible stand out as a stellar achievement and a model 
for others in all fields of endeavor. We will miss you, Steve.
author: Howard
